description: Represents a Quobyte mount that lasts the lifetime of a pod. Quobyte volumes do not support ownership management or SELinux relabeling.

group.description: Group to map volume access to Default is no group

readOnly.description: ReadOnly here will force the Quobyte volume to be mounted with read-only permissions. Defaults to false.

registry.description: Registry represents a single or multiple Quobyte Registry services specified as a string as host:port pair (multiple entries are separated with commas) which acts as the central registry for volumes

tenant.description: Tenant owning the given Quobyte volume in the Backend Used with dynamically provisioned Quobyte volumes, value is set by the plugin

user.description: User to map volume access to Defaults to serivceaccount user

volume.description: Volume is a string that references an already created Quobyte volume by name.
